talks.title: Transparency in Innovation - Using Explainable AI (XAI) to Navigate Challenges in Drug Development
talks.description: On average it takes 10 years to get a drug candidate from discovery to market. The hope is that AI could reduce that time by 50% while at the same time reducing costs. However, there are several potential ethical and practical considerations that must be addressed at every step of the process to maximise the benefits while minimising potential risks. While quality of data and biological complexity remain big hurdles, so does lack of transparency in a space where we need to understand why choices are made to reduce bias and improve innovation. As AI algorithms used in drug discovery are complex and difficult to interpret, researchers and regulators can struggle to understand how decisions are made and whether they are based on valid scientific principles. One solution is to explore Explainable AI (XAI) techniques that provide human-understandable explanations for model decisions. Using XAI model  methodologies we can get a deeper understanding of model behaviour, identify potential biases or errors, and make informed decisions about drug candidates, targets, and safety considerations, thus enhances transparency and promoting responsible and ethical AI-driven drug discovery.
talks.previewText: Discussing the use of Explainable AI in Drug Development

talks.title: The Genie in the Bottle: The Ethics of Generative AI
talks.description: This talk delves into the ethical considerations surrounding generative AI exploring the profound implications of generative AI on society, individual rights, and ethical standards.
talks.previewText: Discussing the ethics of generative AI.

talks.title: Unlock your Linkedin potential: Tips and tricks to attract more recruiters
talks.description: Are you curious about what to highlight on your profile as a career changer, are new in the industry or just looking for some handy insider tips. This session will give you direct insights into a tech recruiter's mind
talks.previewText: What to highlight on your profile as a career changer, starting in a new industry or just looking for some handy insider tips from a tech hiring manager and previous Tech recruter.

talks.title: Roundtable - Perfection vs Pragmatism
talks.description: Roundtable discussion as part of the The Live Series on the subject of Perfection vs Pragmatism in software development and is there a right or wrong choice ðŸ’¡
talks.previewText: As a software engineer, you will always find that some people want to perfect their craft, whilst others prioritize speed of delivery. So what makes people choose one or the other? Is there a right or wrong choice? In this episode, the panel discussed how they would describe themselves, has their approach changed since becoming a leader and if so, how?, and what would make them change their approach, among other things
